verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> expressly <S%G4490><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> later <S%G5306><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> shall fall away from <S%G868><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>, giving heed to <S%G4337><s%> seducing <S%G4108><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doctrines <S%G1319><s%> of demons <S%G1140><s%>,
through <S%G1722><s%> the hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> of men that speak lies <S%G5573><s%>, branded <S%G2743><s%> in their <S%G2398><s%> own conscience <S%G4893><s%> as with a hot iron <S%G2743><s%>;

forbidding <S%G2967><s%> to marry <S%G1060><s%>, and commanding to abstain from <S%G567><s%> meats <S%G1033><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be received <S%G3336><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> by them that believe <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1921><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2938><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is good <S%G2570><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> is to be rejected <S%G579><s%>, if it be received <S%G2983><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%>:
for <S%G1063><s%> it is sanctified <S%G37><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayer <S%G1783><s%>.

If thou put <S%G5294><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> in mind of <S%G5294><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, thou shalt be <S%G2071><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, nourished in <S%G1789><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the good <S%G2570><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%> which thou hast <S%G3739><s%> followed until now <S%G3877><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> refuse <S%G3868><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> old wives <S%G1126><s%>' fables <S%G3454><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> exercise <S%G1128><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> bodily <S%G4984><s%> exercise <S%G1129><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> profitable <S%G5624><s%> for a little <S%G3641><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> profitable <S%G5624><s%> for all things <S%G3956><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%> of the life <S%G2222><s%> which now is <S%G3568><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of that which is to come <S%G3195><s%>.
Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> acceptation <S%G594><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> to this end <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2872><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strive <S%G3679><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2872><s%> have our hope <S%G1679><s%> set on <S%G1909><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Saviour <S%G4990><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, specially <S%G3122><s%> of them that believe <S%G4103><s%>.

Let <S%G2706><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> youth <S%G3503><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> be thou <S%G1096><s%> an ensample <S%G5179><s%> to them that believe <S%G4103><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> manner <S%G391><s%> of life <S%G1722><s%>, in love <S%G26><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> purity <S%G47><s%>.
Till <S%G2193><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%>, give heed <S%G4337><s%> to reading <S%G320><s%>, to exhortation <S%G3874><s%>, to teaching <S%G1319><s%>.

Neglect <S%G272><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the gift <S%G5486><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> prophecy <S%G4394><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> the laying on <S%G1936><s%> of the hands <S%G5495><s%> of the presbytery <S%G4244><s%>.

Be diligent <S%G3191><s%> in these things <S%G5023><s%>; give thyself wholly <S%G2468><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G5125><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> progress <S%G4297><s%> may <S%G5600><s%> be manifest <S%G5318><s%> unto <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.

Take heed to <S%G1907><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to thy teaching <S%G1319><s%>. Continue in <S%G1961><s%> these things <S%G846><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> in doing <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thou shalt <S%G4982><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them that hear <S%G191><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>.
